attributes.action: Legislate for measures to protect children whose single parent is sent to custody
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the instant a single parent is sent to custody they are not allowed to make any telephone calls to the outside world.  This very often leaves children at the school gates waiting for dad or more often mum coming to collect them. Due to the custodial sentence the child is left with no one to care for them.  Please petition the Prime Minister to legislate for measures to protect these vulnerable children.
